p:
The Equations (3) and (4) proposed by Heidarpour et al. [ 44, 45] establish that the natural logarithm of induction time has a linear correlation with temperature, as well as the reciprocal of the natural logarithm of induction time has with the reciprocal of temperature, according to the equations: ln (OSI) = aT + b, (3)
ln k = ln(1/OSI) = ln (A) âˆ’ Ea/(RT). (4)
